short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Situ Interactive Widgets for Responsible AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Farsight is a collection of in situ interactive widgets that help large language model (LLM) prompt creators to envision potential harms associated with their AI applications. ðŸŒ±

This extension enables Farsight on Google AI Studio. With a novel in situ design, contextual AI incident feed, and human-AI collaborative harm envisioning, Farsight empowers prompt creators with diverse backgrounds to be more mindful of responsible AI during early AI prototyping.
